definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: The President refused to either confirm or deny this rumor.
sentences.chinese: 总统拒绝证实或否认这种传闻。

sentences.english: I hear there is a (kegger) [beer party] at John's house tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我传闻今晚在约翰家里有一个啤酒集会。

sentences.english: All Sagas are rumoured to be 25pts each.
sentences.chinese: 传闻所有传说应该为25分每个。
我从来不信捕风捉影的传闻。

sentences.english: He referred to rumors in the graces of the hand-picked running mate Cui Jianbang any master of ceremonies?
sentences.chinese: 提到他钦点传闻中得宠的崔建邦拍档任司仪？

sentences.english: Hong Kong actor HIV Y rumors, has recently swept the entertainment industry.
sentences.chinese: 香港Y男星艾滋传闻，最近正席卷娱乐界。

sentences.english: Mere report is not enough to go upon.
The same can be said for the fabled Microsoft slate products.
sentences.chinese: 同样的情况也可以发生在传闻中的微软的平板产品。

sentences.english: It's long been rumored that United Technologies is pondering a sale of Sikorsky.
sentences.chinese: 一直有传闻称，联合技术公司正在考虑出售西科斯基。

sentences.english: There is no more I can tell you about that ancient tower.
sentences.chinese: 关于那座古塔的传闻我已经全告诉您了。

sentences.english: Gregor was rumored to be discontented and having affairs.
sentences.chinese: 传闻格雷戈尔对她不满，有了外遇。

sentences.english: Some sites claimed this news came from U. S. blogs and small websites. This article from IFeng talked about a “rumor” found on a Team Liquid forum posted by a Romanian
sentences.chinese: 一些网站声称此传闻来源于美国博客和一些小站。

sentences.english: Kim is rumored to have visited solar power and electronics companies in Jiangsu province, where Yangzhou is located.
sentences.chinese: 传闻金正日考察了江苏扬州的太阳能和电子制造公司。

sentences.english: Talk of him leaving in the summer is just mischief-making.
sentences.chinese: 说他夏天离开的传闻只是无稽之谈。

sentences.english: The claim was eventually retracted, one of several such retractions over the past several days.
sentences.chinese: 传闻最终收回，过去几天诸如此类的传闻相继收回。

sentences.english: The claim was eventually retracted, one of several such retractions over the past several days.
sentences.chinese: 传闻最终收回，过去几天诸如此类的传闻相继收回。

definition: widely spread/widely rumored/stories abound/(sb's exploits are) widely circulated
lit. wind from an empty cave (idiom)/fig. unfounded (story)/baseless (claim)
to burst out/to appear unexpectedly/to break (media story)
it is rumored that .../it is reported that ...
